channel.title: Activating PayPal
channel.description:
Alright so I have money on my PayPal, enough to buy MineCraft and I don't want to ask my Dad for his Credit Card to activate purchasing, so does anyone know any methods of using fake generated credit cards (or something) so I can buy it?
I was originally going to ask someone to activate my paypal for me, then I'll buy minecraft and let them teamview or get on my paypal again to remove the credit card info.

item.title: Activating PayPal
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

Only way to do it is use your phone to activate it. They have a $0.00 sending limit when it is not active.

Read full topic

item.title: Activating PayPal
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:1, topic:375608”]Alright so I have money on my PayPal, enough to buy MineCraft and I don’t want to ask my Dad for his Credit Card to activate purchasing, so does anyone know any methods of using fake generated credit cards (or something) so I can buy it?

I was originally going to ask someone to activate my paypal for me, then I’ll buy minecraft and let them teamview or get on my paypal again to remove the credit card info.[/quote]
You can buy minecraft with a non-activated paypal, myns not activated. If you really want to activate it, order a Visa card from them.

Read full topic
